title: My uncle will buy me the latest iPhone when he comes, but he comes earlier than the iPhone 12 Pro Max will be released. Is the iPhone 11 Pro Max still awesome? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here’s a pro-tip from someone who has upgraded phones for years. Upgrades mean fuck all. You get a better feature sub-set. You get excited for a while and it becomes normal. Your 11 Pro is a downgrade from the 12 Pro, but the only winner in getting the new phone is Apple. They make the money from your uncle, you get a new phone, become complacent and then want something new. If your current device works, then there is nothing wrong with it.

yes it very much is and you should thank him for whatever he can give that actually works properly. a phone is a gift, not a first-amendment right. gotta remember, us old guys grew when those gadgets didn’t even exist as dreams…so it’s perfectly possible to get along with them
